alert.note: Alert for Clark; Dallas; Garland; Grant; Hot Spring; Pulaski; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 13 at 12:24PM CDT until April 13 at 1:15PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Clark County in southwestern Arkansas... Grant County in central Arkansas... Northern Dallas County in southwestern Arkansas... East central Garland County in central Arkansas... Southeastern Saline County in central Arkansas... Eastern Hot Spring County in southwestern Arkansas... Southeastern Pulaski County in central Arkansas... * Until 115 PM CDT. * At 1224 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Lonsdale to near Malvern to Richwoods, moving northeast at 80 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Little Rock... North Little Rock... Benton... Sherwood... Bryant... Malvern... Downtown Little Rock... Sheridan... Southwest Little Rock... Haskell... Shannon Hills... Wrightsville... Argenta... Rockport... Traskwood... Leola... Tull... Carthage... Prattsville... Poyen... This includes the following highways... Interstate 30 between mile markers 97 and 142. Interstate 40 between mile markers 153 and 162. Interstate 430 between mile markers 1 and 5. Interstate 530 between mile markers 1 and 16. Interstate 630 between mile markers 1 and 6. Interstate 440 between mile markers 1 and 13. US Highway 67 between mile markers 1 and 2. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for central, southeastern and southwestern Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for central, southeastern and southwestern Arkansas.

area.areaDesc: Clark; Dallas; Garland; Grant; Hot Spring; Pulaski; Saline
